alert.note: Alert for Benson; Eddy; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 11:51AM CST until January 05 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will result in near blizzard conditions at times. * WHERE...Benson, Towner and Eddy Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce the visibility at times. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
